introduction: 你打算怎么度过假期呢？How are you going to spend the holiday?

contents.en: What are your vacation plans yet?

cn.words: 我_打算_去_找_一份_工作。_你呢？

contents.en: I intend to look for a job. How about you?

cn.words: 我_还_没有_决定。_你_有_什么_建议_吗？

contents.en: I have not decided. Do you have any advice?

cn.words: 我_觉得_你_可以_去_学习_游泳。

contents.en: I think you can go to learn to swim.

cn.words: 很_好，_我_跟_父母_一起_去_了_桂林。

contents.en: Ah well, I went to Guilin with their parents.

cn.words: 桂林_很_美，_天_很_蓝，_水_很_清，_空气_新鲜，_人_也_很_友好。

contents.en: Guilin is beautiful, the sky is blue, water is very clear, fresh air, people are very friendly.

cn.words: 哦，_那_确实_是_个_不错_的_旅行。

contents.en: Oh, it is indeed a good trip.

cn.words: 是的。_你呢？_假期_过_得_怎么样？
cn.pinyins: shì de_nǐ ne_jià qī_guò_de_zěn me yàng

contents.en: Yes. How about you? how was your vacation?

cn.words: 我_找_了_个_卖_东西_的_工作，_从中_学习_了_很多。
cn.pinyins: wǒ_zhǎo_le_gè_mài_dōng xi_de_gōng zuò_cóng zhōng_xué xí_le_hěn duō

contents.en: I found a job selling things, learn a lot.

cn.words: 真_好。_我们_都_度过_了_一个_美好_的_假期。
cn.pinyins: zhēn_hǎo_wǒ men_dōu_dù guò_le_yí gè_měi hǎo_de_jià qī

contents.en: that's nice. We all had a wonderful holiday.

cn.words: 在_假期_我_不_想_做_任何_作业。

contents.en: In the holidays I do not want to do any work.

cn.words: 作业_可以_帮助_我们_复习。
cn.pinyins: zuò yè_kě yǐ_bāng zhù_wǒ men_fù xí

cn.words: 好吧。_可_这样_可以_增加_我们_的_记忆。
cn.pinyins: hǎo ba_Kě_zhè yàng_kě yǐ_zēng jiā_wǒ men_de_jì yì

contents.en: Ok. This can increase our memory.

cn.words: 我们_没_必要_在_这个_时候_做_这么_多_作业。
cn.pinyins: wǒ men_méi_bì yào_zài_zhè gè_shí hou_zuò_zhè me_duō_zuò yè

contents.en: We do not need at this time to do so much work.
